jd: Hello ,My name is Gurdeep Singh and I am a Staffing Specialist at Sibitalent. I am reaching out to you on an exciting job opportunity with one of our client Job Title: Senior Java Developer (RxJava & Kafka)Location: Sunnyvale, CADuration: 6+ months Experience: [8+ years / as required]Visa: No H1-OPT-CPTNode: Local to CA Required Skills & Qualifications8+ years of experience in Java development with a deep understanding of object-oriented programming and design principles.Strong hands-on experience with RxJava or similar reactive programming libraries.Proven experience with Apache Kafka for building real-time event-driven architectures.Familiarity with multithreading, concurrency, and parallel processing.Experience in distributed systems and event streaming.Knowledge of microservices architecture and RESTful API development.Proficiency with SQL and NoSQL databases.Familiarity with CI/CD tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI, or CircleCI.Strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
